de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages
Class AbstractLanguage

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.AbstractLanguage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Language
Direct Known Subclasses:
L0Language
public abstract class AbstractLanguage
extends Object
implements Language

Abstract base class for classes that implement the Language interface.

Version:
$Rev: 415 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
Language

Constructor Summary
protected AbstractLanguage()
          Allocates a new AbstractLanguage.
 
Method Summary
 LanguageParser newParser(Reader reader)
          Convenience wrapper method for the Language.newParser(LanguageScanner) method, which automatically allocates a scanner for the specified reader using the Language.newScanner(Reader) method.
 TypeCheckerProofModel newTypeCheckerProofModel(Expression expression)
          Allocates a new TypeCheckerProofModel for the expression in this language, which is used to prove that expression is well-typed using the rules from this language.
 LanguageTypeParser newTypeParser(LanguageTypeScanner scanner)
          Allocates a new LanguageTypeParser for this language, using the specified scanner as token source for the newly allocated parser.
 LanguageTypeParser newTypeParser(Reader reader)
          Convenience wrapper for the Language.newTypeParser(LanguageTypeScanner) method, which automatically creates a new LanguageTypeScanner for the specified reader.
 LanguageTypeScanner newTypeScanner(Reader reader)
          Allocates a new LanguageTypeScanner, a lexer, for this language, which parses tokens that may appear in a MonoTypes string representation from the specified reader.

Method Detail

newTypeCheckerProofModel

public TypeCheckerProofModel newTypeCheckerProofModel(Expression expression)
Allocates a new TypeCheckerProofModel for the expression in this language, which is used to prove that expression is well-typed using the rules from this language.

Specified by:
newTypeCheckerProofModel in interface Language
Parameters:
expression - the Expression for the type checker proof model.
Returns:
the newly allocated type checker proof model.
See Also:
Language.newTypeCheckerProofModel(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Expression)

newParser

public final LanguageParser newParser(Reader reader)
Convenience wrapper method for the Language.newParser(LanguageScanner) method, which automatically allocates a scanner for the specified reader using the Language.newScanner(Reader) method.

Specified by:
newParser in interface Language
Parameters:
reader - the Reader for the source input stream.
Returns:
the newly allocated parser for this language.
See Also:
languages.Language#newParser(java.io.Reader)

newTypeParser

public LanguageTypeParser newTypeParser(LanguageTypeScanner scanner)
Allocates a new LanguageTypeParser for this language, using the specified scanner as token source for the newly allocated parser. The parser can then be used to parse the tokens returned from the scanner into a valid MonoType.

Specified by:
newTypeParser in interface Language
Parameters:
scanner - the scanner from which to read the tokens.
Returns:
a newly allocated type parser for this language.
See Also:
Language.newTypeParser(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.LanguageTypeScanner)

newTypeParser

public final LanguageTypeParser newTypeParser(Reader reader)
Convenience wrapper for the Language.newTypeParser(LanguageTypeScanner) method, which automatically creates a new LanguageTypeScanner for the specified reader.

Specified by:
newTypeParser in interface Language
Parameters:
reader - the reader from which to read the source code.
Returns:
the newly allocated type parser for this language.
See Also:
Language.newTypeParser(java.io.Reader)

newTypeScanner

public LanguageTypeScanner newTypeScanner(Reader reader)
Allocates a new LanguageTypeScanner, a lexer, for this language, which parses tokens that may appear in a MonoTypes string representation from the specified reader.

Specified by:
newTypeScanner in interface Language
Parameters:
reader - the Reader for the source input stream.
Returns:
a newly allocated scanner for this language.
See Also:
Language.newTypeScanner(java.io.Reader)
